title: Calling variants in diploid systems
questions: How to find variable sites in diploid genomes?
objectives: Identification of genetic variations using variant calling
key_points: Freebayes calls variant using haplotype windows
SNPEff allows functional annotation of variants
Gemini is a flexible system for analyzing variation patterns

workflows.name: Diploid
workflows.title: Diploid
